item.title: web3 is here
item.description:
tl;dr

I’m aware of current criticism, I’m follower of web3 is going just great from Molly White but also a techno-optimist Ã  la Thoreau (not Andressen’s definition), so even working close to blockchains and using bitcoin since 2014 I always been skeptical until last years events. The idea here is not to convince or promote anything, just summarize some definitions and references about how things are going at this point.

btw, what is web3?

The term “web3” was coined in 2014 by Ethereum co-founder Gavin Wood, is an idea for a new iteration of the World Wide Web which incorporates concepts such as decentralization, blockchain technologies, and token-based economics.
